Documentation.content: Module to calculate matrix dimensions and matrix partition dimensions from matrix cells.
Documentation.firstline: Module to calculate matrix dimensions and matrix partition dimensions from matrix cells

Definition.name: tran

Documentation.return: Matrix in DATASET(Layout_Cell) form alpha * A**T + beta * C
Documentation.content: Transpose a matrix and sum into base matrix result <== alpha * A**t + beta * C, A is n by m, C is m by n A**T (A Transpose) and C must have same shape

param.name: alpha
param.desc: Scalar multiplier for the A**T matrix

param.name: beta
param.desc: Scalar multiplier for the C matrix

Documentation.firstline: Transpose a matrix and sum into base matrix

Signature.name: tran
Signature.param: (value_t alpha, DATASET(Layout_Cell) A, value_t beta=0, DATASET(Layout_Cell) C=empty_c)

Definition.Signature: DATASET(Layout_Cell) tran(value_t alpha, DATASET(Layout_Cell) A, value_t beta=0, DATASET(Layout_Cell) C=empty_c)

Documentation.return: Matrix in DATASET(Layout_Cell) form alpha * A**T + beta * C
Documentation.content: Transpose a matrix and sum into base matrix result <== alpha * A**t + beta * C, A is n by m, C is m by n A**T (A Transpose) and C must have same shape

param.name: alpha
param.desc: Scalar multiplier for the A**T matrix

param.name: beta
param.desc: Scalar multiplier for the C matrix
